name: European Federation of Employee Share Ownership
membership: We are a partner member of the European Federation of Financial Services Users (Better Finance)
goal: The EFES' objective is to act as the umbrella organization of employee owners, companies and all persons, trade unions, experts, researchers, institutions looking to promote employee share ownership and participation in Europe.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
euInitiatives:
The promotion of employee share ownership and participation
CMU Action Plan
Shareholders Rights Directive
Corporate governance
Europe 2020
Single Market
Small Business Act
